name: D'ough (bugfix)
description:
Daring Owl Studios presents

D’ough! 

A sourdough starter simulator

Laggy wants to learn how to make sourdough starter. He’s heard that if he can keep his starter alive, he can breed the same starter over and over to make endless baking products.

He’s got time on his paws and friends he can’t visit. Some of them are even forgetting what he looks like! Can he mature his sourdough starter quickly enough to rescue his ailing friendships?

Probably not! Because he’s a sloth.

This is the post-jam bugfix version. Originally created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 46: Keep It Alive.
